sentences.en: A gaggle of journalists sit in a hotel foyer waiting impatiently.
sentences.cn: 一群乱哄哄的记者坐在酒店大堂里焦急地等待着。

sentences.en: A gaggle of photographers huddled on the sidewalk beside a swelling crowd of onlookers ( Gioia Diliberto )
sentences.cn: 一群摄影师拥挤在路边,旁边是一大群旁观者 ( 乔亚迪利贝托 )

sentences.en: A gaggle of screaming children waited just outside the gym, some seeking autographs.
sentences.cn: 一群尖叫的孩子等在体育场外, 有些想要寻求球星签名.

sentences.en: By happy accident, the German government recently played host to a gaggle of Brussels - based reporters.
sentences.cn: 碰巧德国最近接待了一群布鲁塞尔总部来的嘎嘎乱叫的报告团.

sentences.en: In another hospital, I found a gaggle of rural patients crouching on the forecourt.
sentences.cn: 在另一家医院, 我一群吵闹的农村病人蹲在医院的大厅.

sentences.en: Instead, this gaggle of leading financiers called for a new reserve currency, akin style gold standard.
sentences.cn: 相反, 这群重要的金融家呼吁设立一种类似于传统金本位的新的储备货币.

sentences.en: Is the field of view wide enough to hold , say , a smallish gaggle of your friends?
sentences.cn: 视野是否宽阔?可否将一群唧唧喳喳的朋友收进去?

sentences.en: Maintain gaggle not to move what have many system namely, do not mix, should strengthen segregation.
sentences.cn: 保持鹅群不动即有多个小群体的, 不要混合, 应加强隔离.

sentences.en: They all burst out laughing, sounding like a gaggle of geese.
sentences.cn: 她们全都放声大笑, 像一群鸭子一样嘎嘎地叫着.

trans.tran_cn: （鹅）群，<口>散乱的一群，缺乏组织的团体
